typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		dt as string,
		AverageTemperature as string,
		AverageTemperatureUncertainty as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string,
		Latitude as string,
		Longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceTemperature
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SourceHeader
SourceTemperature filter(Country == 'Canada') ~> FilterCanadaData
SourceHeader, SelectChangedColumns union(byName: true)~> CombineDatasets
FilterCanadaData derive(row_id = 1,
		Column_1 = dt,
		Column_2 = AverageTemperature,
		Column_3 = AverageTemperatureUncertainty,
		Column_4 = City,
		Column_5 = Country,
		Column_6 = Latitude,
		Column_7 = Longitude) ~> ColumnChange
ColumnChange select(mapColumn(
		row_id,
		each(match(startsWith(name,'Column_')))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectChangedColumns
CombineDatasets sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['GlobalLandTemperaturesByMajorCity-Canada.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SingOutputDataset
